::: {style="text-align: center"}
## Welcome to AMRBiostats {.unnumbered}
:::

This website aims to provide a valuable resource for students and researchers aiming to learn biostatistics and the R programming language. It was built entirely using [{{< iconify simple-icons:quarto >}}]{style="color: #68a1d3"} [Quarto](https://quarto.org/)^Â®^ and [R](https://www.r-project.org). Additionally, [GitHub Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot) was utilized to increase productivity via streamlining the typing process.

::: {style="text-align: center"}
## What You Will Find Here {.unnumbered}
:::

-   Tutorials: Step-by-step guides on biostatistics and R programming.

-   Code Examples: Ready-to-use R scripts for various statistical analyses.

-   Articles: In-depth articles explaining complex biostatistics topics.

-   Consultation and Coaching: You can request personalized guidance or courses tailored to your needs to address the challenges frequently encountered in biostatistics.

::: {style="text-align: center"}
